attributes.review: I hate this app. It took forever to download and it is so laggy. The app doesn’t work and it’s very very confusing!
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: i opened the app to find a rotting peach in a suit. he looked like a monster SHIVER ME TIMBERS 😟 i was so scared i ran away from home and now live on the streets 🤪 the monster can’t get under my bed if i don’t have one 🤖👽👾BEEP BOOP BOB
attributes.title: ✨NO✨

attributes.review: Without much explanation, I will just say I support my tiktok community more than the trump administration. Thank you for your time
attributes.title: Here we go again

attributes.review: too hard to navigate i dropped my toaster in the driveway and now my grandmas crying while eating chicken nuggets with no water😤
attributes.title: Navigation Issues

attributes.review: Ummm as soon as I open the app I saw this wrinkly old rotten orange on the screen then he proceeded to reach his arms out of the phone and choke me to death.✖️👄✖️ Yes this is my ghost typing right not. 👻10/10 WILL NEVER USE AGAIN 👿
attributes.title: Ms. Gurl 👁👄👁

attributes.review: When i first downloaded it, it started glitching 😤  and then a scary pop out showed... it was momo. Please don’t download the app, it contains scary pop ups 😡😤😤
attributes.title: #nobodylikesyou

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could reverse-engineer the app. I discovered that this app is stealing users data!!! Everyone must delete this app and it needs to be banned from the US!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS STEALING DATA

attributes.review: This app is really SCARY!! when i opened the app. i saw a oopalupa Cheeto staring at me. its so scary. i'm currently crying and at my therapist. it not worth my time. and i HATE IT!! i wish apps were more intertaining as tiktok and NOT AS SCARY 😭😭. Please Help Me God 😰🙏🏻
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: This app makes my phone crash it doesn’t provide ANY useful information concerning any election, etc. worst app on the App Store !
attributes.title: Unprofessional

attributes.review: I got this app bc I wanted to “support “ our orange of a president. But instead it kept logging me out and spamming my phone number. It turned my screen orange.
attributes.title: Spam
